mapper.insert: insert into course(course_name, course_info, distance, time) values(#{course_name}, #{course_info}, #{distance}, #{time})
mapper.select: select course_no from course where course_name = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into course_detail(course_no, waypoint, lat, log, addr) value(${param1}, ${param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5})
